Literature.Title: Synthetic Peptide Libraries Designed From a Minimal Alpha-Helical Domain of AS-48-Bacteriocin Homologs Exhibit Potent Antibacterial Activity.
Literature.Author: Ross JN, Fields FR, Kalwajtys VR, Gonzalez AJ, O'Connor S, Zhang A, Moran TE, Hammers DE, Carothers KE, Lee SW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MBC=4µM),Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1 5448(MIC=0.5µM),Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1 5448(MBC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MBC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=128µM)
